Title: Kindergartens
Description:
This map shows the number of kindergartens within a 10-kilometer radius, based on data sourced from OpenStreetMap as of 2023.

It is clear that kindergartens are mostly concentrated in urban areas and are underrepresented in rural regions. This is likely due to population differences between cities and villages. As a result, the highest concentration of kindergartens can be found in regional centers and large cities.
